title: Self-Regulated Learning and Engagement Enhancement Program for [Large-Scale] Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of fundamental nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Environment where learners composed of in-service professionals perform collaborative and reflective activities on an online platform, with asynchronous assignment submissions and feedback facilitated via LMS

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% participation in peer knowledge sharing and collaborative learning using the jigsaw teaching method
Learners can improve learning outcomes by at least 20% by applying three or more self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, time management planning, self-assessment)
Learners can write reflective reports on the entire learning process through formative assessments (self-assessment/peer assessment)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
